Space-Comm Expo 2026

16 March 2026 – 19 March 2026

Hub Exhibitions London, United Kingdom

Space-Comm Expo at ExCel London is the UK’s leading event for the space industry with over 200 exhibitors, 50 speakers and 5,000 attendees including global leaders and influencers from across government, business, aerospace and defence.

It’s the largest event for the UK space industry with international delegations and visitors from NASA, ESA, NATO alongside Primes, SMEs and Start-Ups at the forefront of technology and innovation.

Now entering its fifth year, the multi award-winning Space-Comm Expo is dedicated to supporting the space industry with a unique format including UK and international exhibitors, product demonstrations, keynote speakers, multiple conference theatres, roundtables and 1-2-1 networking opportunities.

Space-Comm Expo is organised and owned by Hub Exhibitions. Hub Exhibitions is the most trusted and impartial event organiser for the space industry. We have no bias or agenda except to produce the best space Expos for both exhibitors and attendees. Space-Comm is the community hub for the space industry. Everyone in the industry is welcome at Space-Comm and there is no requirement to be a paid member of a trade organisation or body.

THE UK: A GROWING SPACE POWERHOUSE

Commercial turnover growth continues to increase year on year for the industry, reaching £17.5 billion in 2022 and adding £7 billion to the UK economy.

A future titan within the international market, space exports valued £5.9 billion to the UK in 2022.

The UK contributes 6.5% to the global space market and the UK government want to grow this sector to 10% by 2030. Space-Comm Expo is the first large scale event of its kind dedicated to the commercial future of space.

ASSEMBLING THE INTERNATIONAL SPACE INDUSTRY

Plus

  • The most important date in the UK space industry calendar
  • The only event that covers the whole of the space supply chain
  • Discover new technologies, innovations and applications from over 170+ suppliers
  • Learn from keynotes and case studies
  • Hear influential international space industry and government speakers
  • Gain knowledge from world-leading authorities & technical experts
  • Source new products, services and suppliers with specialist expertiseSave time finding new suppliers with our 1-2-1 Meet the Buyer sessions
  • Meet the next generation of innovators and disruptors in the Start Up Zone
  • Join our invitation-only roundtables
  • Save time by meeting our phenomenal exhibitor line-up in one place
  • Over 30 hours of free-to-attend high level conference sessions
  • A new theatre programme stream dedicated to Defence & Security

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
